name: FreeCell Solitaire Classic ◆
description:
The best FREE FreeCell game on the app store!

- Over 40 HD themes!
- Portrait or Landscape orientation.
- iPad and iPhone support.
- Over 10,000 winnable games.
- Simple and intuitive controls - just tap cards to make moves.
- Auto moves, hints, stats, and more.
- Easy to play & win!

Thanks for playing! For fast and friendly support, email us at contact@maplemedia.io.
